translations.835624956517287043:
Paste your OpenVPN configuration here. It should include directives like 'remote', 'proto', 'dev', etc.

Example:
client
dev tun
proto udp
remote vpn.example.com 1194
auth-user-pass
cipher AES-256-GCM
auth SHA256
